body:
For both those cases, a new error code must be added in https://github.com/fastify/fastify/blob/master/lib/errors.js and documented. It should be pretty simple.
See https://github.com/fastify/fastify/pull/1168 for how error codes where added in the first place.
Thanks, If you can help me to **reproduce** both errors it will be great.

They are already covered in our tests:

* https://github.com/fastify/fastify/blob/347957c77e384d44b90adc9ad9347a0974ada922/test/async-await.js#L360
* https://github.com/fastify/fastify/blob/c4eb1d96c0febcd2e52e665c68bd85fab55c0787/test/hooks.test.js#L2018

Fixing seems very simple - add code in error.js like below right?
```
createError('FST_ERR_DEC_ALREADY_PRESENT', `The decorator '%s' has already been added!`)
````
@mcollina I've changed reply.js(locally). Can you help me to create new test in hooks.test.js according to it?
I think you should just add two more assertions in the test I linked, verifying the error code.

@mcollina 

fastify/test/hooks.test.js
```
throw new Error('You cannot use `send` inside the `onError` hook')
```
IMO this line supposed to have variable **send** and **onError** OR this line contains ``` ` ``` sign for other purposes??

because I've tried to log that line in test and got same in message : 'You cannot use ``` `send` ``` inside the ``` `onError` ``` hook'

So I am going to change : 
'You cannot use ``` `send` ``` inside the ``` `onError` ``` hook'
To
'You cannot use ``` send ``` inside the ``` onError ``` hook' (without ``` ` ```)

@mcollina
Please send a PR, so we can help you where you are stuck.

issue.title: Fix #1334

labels.name: semver-minor
labels.description: Issue or PR that should land as semver minor

repository.name: fastify
repository.description: Fast and low overhead web framework, for Node.js

issue.body:
<!--
Thank you for your pull request. Please provide a description above and review
the requirements below.

Bug fixes and new features should include tests and possibly benchmarks.

Tip: `npm run bench` to compare branches interactively.

Contributors guide: https://github.com/fastify/fastify/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

Added two Missing error codes in files ``` lib/reply.js ``` and ``` lib/wrapThenable.js ``` which fix issue #1334

#### Checklist

- [x] run `npm run test` and `npm run benchmark`
- [ ] tests and/or benchmarks are included
- [ ] documentation is changed or added
- [x] commit message and code follows [Code of conduct](https://github.com/fastify/fastify/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

body: Created PR #1348 to fix this issue @mcollina
